title: H\"ormander and Bernhardsson's extremal function I
authors:
Andriy Bondarenko, Joaquim Ortega-Cerd\`a, Danylo Radchenko, Kristian
  Seip
abstract:
We study the function $\varphi_1$ of minimal $L^1$ norm among all functions
$f$ of exponential type at most $\pi$ for which $f(0)=1$. This function, first
studied by H\"{o}rmander and Bernhardsson in 1993, has only real zeros $\pm
\tau_n$, $n=1,2, \ldots$, and the sequence $(\tau_n-n-\frac12)$ has $\ell^2$
norm bounded by $0.13$. The zeros $\tau_n$ can be computed by means of a fixed
point iteration.
